package.name: Ethereal_Message_Style
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Ethereal, now with:
  • 8 Flavors of bubble!
  • Smooth bubble fade-in effects!
  • Alternate icon support!
  • Completely rewritten code! No more breakage when you stretch the window!
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=2141
